attributes.action: Grant British citizenship for resident, frontline NHS workers, NHS heroes.
attributes.additional_details: International doctors, nurses and other NHS staff literally scarified or lost their life on the frontline of COVID-19 battle. Many had COVID, recovered, just to go back and help their patients again. Those brave NHS workers were as patriotic as any British citizen. A great reward for their hard work and scarifies is to offer them accelerated route for citizenship application. A good European example is what France done by granting citizenship to health care worker in recognition of their work.
attributes.background:
To offer accelerated, French style, grant of citizenship for currently resident NHS workers on indefinite leave to remain or work visa. 
Currently, application for citizenship must be a year after securing the ILR. Please recognise NHS workers great scarifies by accelerating this process.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign some of these petitions:

Allow all non-UK NHS workers to become UK citizens for free: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/564829

Extend rights to Indefinite Leave to Remain for non-UK NHS workers: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/564809

Reduce the minimum time required for ILR to 3 years for non-UK NHS workers: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/321657

Allow all NHS workers to get ILR after five years regardless of initial visa: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/321244

If there is a specific way you would like the Government to change immigration arrangements for NHS workers, which is not covered by the above petitions, you could start a new petition requesting this.
